body:
Hey Avicus,
So recently my YouTube Channel got spotlighted on my MCN's Main Channel here and so that had me thinking of making a channel tralier and what other awesome people to ask then you guys! 

By Channel Trailer I mean when a person that is not subbed to my channel then they will see a little 2 minute video of my channel thats a channel trailer

What video should I feature in my channel trailer? (Must be one of my own)
(Also add timestamp of when the feature is)

Those who I accept there channel trailer ideas will be credited in the description of the video
So fire away and I will probably close this channel trailer ideas in about a week or so!

As they say in my hometown of Australia! ハッピーオーストラリアデー！

title: Ideas for a YouTube Channel Trailer

replies.body:
Hmmm an Avicus gameplay thingy perhaps? Maybe?

By trailer I'm assuming you mean your intro to your vids. Diversify man, if you know how to model then make an animation dealing with Avicus or any server/gamemode you're gonna play.

DTM? A guy mining a monument and getting attacked.

Walls? Self-explanatory.

If you don't want that or you don't know how to model then try animating if you know how.

replies.body:
Alright.
Basically for a trailer I'd do a sort of montage of all the games you do, or just some type of "best moments" compilation. The point of a trailer is to make your channel look good and stand out to people, so if they see funny clips in a trailer, they'd be more attracted to your channel than just a video with boring stuff.

I made a channel trailer a while ago and you can check it out on my homepage if you're not subscribed to me, or you can just click here. That's pretty old though and I should be making a new one soon, but I hope you get some ideas from it.

Anyways, good luck with your channel man :D
